::Dark Lavacons::

          The Dark Lavacons are now in the midst of a ba=
ttle.  They had been needed by the Alliance to help fight Rage, but this ba=
ttle was more important(Actually, anything involving war is most important,=
 as long as it's there and happening).

          Astral laughed his evil l=
augh, and fired his dark flame rocket launcher at Jetstorm.

          Feno=
x landed, and fired his dark heat optic lazers at Jetstorm.

          Reck=
lessa landed, pulled out her dark flame gatling guns and started opening ma=
d fire on Sharpedge.

          Griplash jumped down on the ground, and cam=
e tearing at Diskus with his dark lava blade.

           Starlight grabbed=
 her dark flame crossbow.  She fired it off in one direction, and then the =
other, just for fun.

           Then she pointed straight at Rizopas.

   =
        "Kiss your waste disposal unit goodbye!!!!!" She said, and fired.
